static java.math.BigInteger getTokenBasedOnPrimaryCount(int keyCount)
          Given the number of keys that need to be transferred say, 1000 and given the smallest key stored we need the hash of the 1000th key greater than the smallest key in the sorted order in the primary range.

Method Detail

getTokenBasedOnPrimaryCount

public static java.math.BigInteger getTokenBasedOnPrimaryCount(int keyCount)
Given the number of keys that need to be transferred say, 1000 and given the smallest key stored we need the hash of the 1000th key greater than the smallest key in the sorted order in the primary range.

Parameters:
keyCount - number of keys after which token is required.
Returns:
token.
